SamPy.astronomy.gasmasses.HIMassFunctionZwaan¶

SamPy.astronomy.gasmasses.HIMassFunctionZwaan(mbin, H0=70.0)¶

Observed HI mass function FROM Zwaan et al.

Parameters:
  • mbin (ndarray) – bins in log10(masses)
  • H0 (float) – Hubble constant
Returns:

theta
